ValidationRule.description: This validation rule ensures that when an Account Contact Relation is associated with an Account of type 'Committee', and the user's role contains 'EDRD', the Contact's related Account must be of type 'Provider/Reviewer'.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "EDRD"), OR( INCLUDES(Roles, 'Reviewer'), INCLUDES(Roles, 'Chair'), INCLUDES(Roles, 'Vice Chair') ), OR( Account.RecordType.DeveloperName != 'EDRD_Committee', NOT( OR( Contact.Account.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Provider', Contact.Account.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Committee_Reviewer' ) ), AND( Contact.Account.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Provider', NOT(ISPICKVAL(Contact.Account.Provider_Type__pc, 'Physician')) ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: An EDRD user can only associate a contact of Provider or Committee Reviewer with an EDRD Committee Account with Roles includes Reviewer, Chair or Vice Chair.
